column1: A body  search  of the  appellant  was  carried  out only  after  she  was

column2: taken to  the PNB.  There was no reason  to  search her bodily at that
time when PW1  thought it fit  not to  search her bodily in her house,
arrest,  such  a  bodily  search  should  have  carried  out at  that  time.
